lead_paragraph: Thomas Bach, the International Olympic Committee president, said India was not ready to bid for the 2024 Olympics but could be a candidate to host the Games in the future.

headline.main: India Called Not Ready to Host Games
headline.print_headline: India Called Not Ready to Host Games

snippet: Thomas Bach, the International Olympic Committee president, said India was not ready to bid for the 2024 Olympics but could be a candidate to host the Games in the future.
